about_the_game:
It’s not all about passengers out there – discover different freight traffic with Skyhook Games’ Cargo Line for Train Sim World 4. In Volume 2, get into the nitty gritty of hauling key aggregate services with the distinctive slants of the HOA Hopper – be ready to rock and roll.

Climb aboard Class 66 traction and get to work across the UK’s challenging aggregate industry. Featuring the modern HOA hopper wagon, complete with VTG branding, take on the task of moving heavy trains across passenger main lines. Keep the wheelspin under control and always be several steps ahead!

The variants of HOA hopper with Cargo Line Vol.2 include the 116 wagons that entered service in 2016; while many were built with handbrake wheels cut into the side, the batch ordered for VTG have a clean side with no handbrake – both of these are included. The wagons are a muted slivery grey and can appear VTG-branded, unbranded, or unbranded with 9 variants of graffiti.

Across a new selection of scenarios and timetable layers, take on the task of hauling aggregate across both the Midland Main Line and Great Western Express routes, as well as 2x bonus scenarios for Southeastern Highspeed. Explore newly detailed areas such as Mountsorrel Railhead, crawl out the bustling Acton Yard, and weave between Kentish commuter traffic.

With Train Sim World 4’s Free Roam, transfer the action into any route of your choosing, and put your fleet of locomotives to the test dragging long, stone-laden lash-ups.

Experience the challenge of freight with Skyhook Games’ Cargo Line Vol.2 - Aggregates!

Key Features

  • Modern HOA Bogie Hopper Wagon in multiple variants:

    • VTG Grey

    • Unbranded

    • Graffiti (9x random designs)

    • Smooth sided and handbrake-equipped

  • Class 66 locomotive in EWS livery

  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs

  • True-to-life performance and handling

  • 3 additional Scenarios and a Timetable layer each for Midland Main Line and Great Western Express, plus 2 scenarios for Southeastern Highspeed

  • Additional Journey Mode chapters for Midland Main Line and Great Western Express

  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club

  • Explore the trains in Free Roam

  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology

  • Download size: 212 MB
